Articles.Content:
New crazy creation!

The futuristic Nasa Shuttle!

The Tripod Shuttle !!!

It's like a Ferrari in a boxcar: USELESS! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

![UPIBSDw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UPIBSDw.jpg)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/2srae)

Download this magnificent unstable creation here: [http://kerbalx.com/Chiodo/Tripod-Shuttle](http://kerbalx.com/Chiodo/Tripod-Shuttle)
Very nice! The "legs" remind me of a 60s design.
If you're going to post in the exchange, make the craft a replica of an IRL one, or give it a purpose.

> 
> If you're going to post in the exchange, make the craft a replica of an IRL one, or give it a purpose.

Huh? It's for exchanging crafts, no matter what kind. And who says this doesn't have a purpose? It looks as if it can transport crew and look cool at the same time. If this doesn't have a purpose, than neither do the non-functioning replica tanks everyone builds, or the massive in-orbit battleships.

> 
> Huh? It's for exchanging crafts, no matter what kind. And who says this doesn't have a purpose? It looks as if it can transport crew and look cool at the same time. If this doesn't have a purpose, than neither do the non-functioning replica tanks everyone builds, or the massive in-orbit battleships.

Replica tanks? What the heck are those? Also, battleships are a tool for roleplay.

> 
> Replica tanks? What the heck are those? Also, battleships are a tool for roleplay.

Tanks. As in war. As I see it, if you can post ships solely for role-play purposes here, you can post most any craft you like. Including this.

> 
> Tanks. As in war. As I see it, if you can post ships solely for role-play purposes here, you can post most any craft you like. Including this.

LOL I thought you meant fuel tanks. You're right. LOL I'll put the flamethrower down. I expected a flame war, but I'll accept an unconditional surrender.
Peace! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Peace! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This isn't the '60s bruh XD

> 
> Huh? It's for exchanging crafts, no matter what kind. And who says this doesn't have a purpose? It looks as if it can transport crew and look cool at the same time. If this doesn't have a purpose, than neither do the non-functioning replica tanks everyone builds, or the massive in-orbit battleships.

Lawl....battleships are for um....battling stuff (either MP or some games people play, theres a thread somewhere where people used to do turn based fights ect). Tanks are also useable for turn based or DPM games. Its not like combat stuff is useless.

And yeah, there is nothing in this thread stating every craft has to have a purpose, post whatever you want here (as long as its well something worthy of a dedicated thread. personally i think your thing looks neat, has that sorta organic feel, that reminds of some ship ive seen somewhere (forget what movie it was from).

> 
> Lawl....battleships are for um....battling stuff (either MP or some games people play, theres a thread somewhere where people used to do turn based fights ect). Tanks are also useable for turn based or DPM games. Its not like combat stuff is useless.
> And yeah, there is nothing in this thread stating every craft has to have a purpose, post whatever you want here (as long as its well something worthy of a dedicated thread. personally i think your thing looks neat, has that sorta organic feel, that reminds of some ship ive seen somewhere (forget what movie it was from).

Thanks to Zucal for the support of my weird creation!

And yes panzer: i made this ship on the "Terraforming ship" seen in Superman, man of steel ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Thanks to Zucal for the support of my weird creation!
> And yes panzer: i made this ship on the "Terraforming ship" seen in Superman, man of steel ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

So I'm the antagonist? Wow. Don't say you didn't say it. I know you did. Thanks for the great title.

> 
> So I'm the antagonist?

Erm... Yes. You're the one trying to start a flamewar.

Chiodo, that looks awesome. Very organic. As organic as you can get when your only color option is white ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[[QUOTE!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)=Hobbes Novakoff;1846113]Erm... Yes. You're the one trying to start a flamewar.

Chiodo, that looks awesome. Very organic. As organic as you can get when your only color option is white ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)[/[QUOTE!\[arrow-10x10.png\](http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/)]I wasn't to. I thought ships need a purpose or being a replica to come on here. But I was corrected and we all became "friends".

> 
> If you're going to post in the exchange, make the craft a replica of an IRL one, or give it a purpose.

Do not spread this infos but Tripod Shuttle can:

- Transport 16 kerbals

- fly and reach planets

- high fuel and monoprop capability

- big engine

- docking port

and the most important thing: it's cool ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> Chiodo, that looks awesome. Very organic. As organic as you can get when your only color option is white ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank youuuu!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I feel so bad. How are you going to make frozen pizzas?! I feel for you and your frozen pizzas.
I love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Cool! Can it land on those legs?

> 
> Cool! Can it land on those legs?

GasTurbo, i tried this for you: with less than 1/4 fuel capability AND reinforcements of the last peaks AND four big landing legs for each of the 3 peaks....

CAN LAND O\_O !!!
I go to bed now, but tell me if you like some changes or whatever ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
